movie.title: Shooting Clerks
movie.plot: The biopic of how Kevin Smith bankrolled his $27,000 first film with maxed-out credit cards and became the darling of the Sundance Film Festival when Clerks debuted there in 1994.

events.title: Kevin Smith managed to have Clerks aired at the Sundance Film Festival
